<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Sensors

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets whether the vehicle can acquire targets via datalink from the [[Side]] center.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vehicleReceiveRemoteTargets''' vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]] ([[vehicle]] [[player]]);</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setVehicleRadar]], [[vehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[setVehicleReportRemoteTargets]], [[setVehicleReceiveRemoteTargets]], [[vehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[setVehicleReportOwnPosition]], [[reportRemoteTarget]], [[confirmSensorTarget]]
</value></part></template>
